entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 5.
